alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:14PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Blaine, southeastern Hill and northeastern Chouteau Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 813 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Parker School, or 24 miles east of Big Sandy, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parker School, Agency, Sangrey, St. Pierre, Azure, Rocky Boy, Lloyd and Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
